pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Moisturising Day Cream SPF15 75ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Skin Perfecting Moisturising Day Cream is a lightweight formula that gently hydrates, balances moisture, and smoothes skin texture.

Warnings

This product contains sunscreen and may cause eye irritation. Please avoid the eye area when applying. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

With SPF 15 to protect from the sun's harmful rays, this nourishing formula is suitable for all skin types, and won't clog pores. It will leave your skin healthy, glowing and supply every day. Dermatologist Tested. Safe for Sensitive Skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Zinc Oxide, Glycerin, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Citric Acid, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Xanthan Gum, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Metabisulfite, Propylene Glycol, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Sulfite, Potassium Sorbate, Steareth-20, Sodium Benzoate, N-hydroxysuccinimide, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone.

Directions

Apply daily to the face and neck area after cleansing, avoiding the eye area.
